note: Making videos, taking photos, recording intimate moments

scenes.generation_prompt: naked man and woman having sex in bedroom, smartphone on tripod recording them, they aware of camera but focused on each other, bedroom with good lighting

user_description.en: The camera records as they make love. Creating their own private video. Knowing it's being captured adds a thrill.
user_description.ru: Пара снимает себя во время секса. Создание личного видео, знание о камере добавляет возбуждения.

ai_context.description: Filming sex together. Creating private content. Testing comfort with recording intimacy.

question_angles.comfort: Would you film yourself having sex?
question_angles.trust: With the right partner, would you create videos?
question_angles.reason: Is it about reliving the moment or the thrill of filming?

taboo_context.normalization: Many couples film themselves—trust and secure storage essential

scenes.generation_prompt: woman posing on bed in black lingerie, man holding camera directing the shot, she enjoying being photographed, soft lighting, bedroom

user_description.en: Posing in lingerie while he captures the image. Boudoir shoot with her partner. Artistic, intimate, creating something beautiful.
user_description.ru: Будуарная фотосессия — партнёр снимает её в белье. Создание красивых интимных фото.

ai_context.description: Boudoir photography by partner. Artistic intimate photos. Testing interest in being photographed.

question_angles.as_model: Would you enjoy a boudoir shoot with your partner?
question_angles.as_photographer: Would you enjoy photographing your partner intimately?

taboo_context.normalization: Boudoir is empowering—celebrating your body through art

scenes.generation_prompt: naked woman lying on bed posing naturally, handing her phone to man asking him to photograph her, trust in her expression, bedroom

user_description.en: She hands him her phone, asking him to capture her. Trusting him with her image. Creating intimate photos together.
user_description.ru: Она просит его сфотографировать её обнажённой. Доверие и создание интимных фото вместе.

ai_context.description: Requesting partner take nude photos. Deep trust gesture. Testing comfort with intimate photography.

question_angles.as_subject: Would you ask your partner to photograph you nude?
question_angles.as_photographer: Would you take intimate photos if asked?
question_angles.trust: Does this level of trust appeal?

taboo_context.normalization: Sharing body through photos can be deeply intimate—requires absolute trust

scenes.generation_prompt: man and woman on couch watching TV screen showing video of themselves being intimate, she curled against him, both watching their own passion on screen, living room

user_description.en: Watching themselves on screen. Their own passion played back. Aroused by seeing what they look like together. Private screening.
user_description.ru: Пара смотрит своё секс-видео вместе. Возбуждает видеть себя со стороны.

ai_context.description: Watching their own sex video. Aroused by seeing themselves. Testing interest in rewatching intimacy.

question_angles.appeal: Would watching your own sex video arouse you?
question_angles.perspective: Are you curious how you look during sex?
question_angles.sharing: Would you enjoy this with your partner?

taboo_context.normalization: Seeing yourself can be enlightening and arousing—many find it hot

scenes.generation_prompt: phone screen showing text conversation where she asks for intimate photo, man holding phone taking photo of himself to send to her

user_description.en: She asks for a photo of him. He takes it, sends it. Digital intimacy exchange. Requested, wanted, appreciated.
user_description.ru: Она просит интимное фото, он отправляет. Запрошено и желанно — совсем другое дело.

ai_context.description: Requested intimate male photo. Consensual exchange. Testing comfort with sending/requesting.

question_angles.as_sender: Would you send intimate photos if asked?
question_angles.as_requester: Would you request intimate photos from partner?

taboo_context.normalization: Consensual requested photos are completely different from unsolicited—context is everything

commented_scenes.reason: Consolidated filming and photography scenes into representative scenarios
commented_scenes.recommendation: Use follow-up questions for specific preferences about what to record and how to use it
